title: [Large-Scale] Design of Motivation-Enhanced Online Education Modules for Medical Residents

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: An advanced training program for medical residents, combining online modules with offline clinical practice, with emphasis on sustaining learning motivation.

learning_goals: Learners achieve a statistically significant improvement of 0.1 points or higher in learning motivation surveys after completing the motivation-enhancement module
Learners maintain a participation rate of 90% or higher in the motivation-enhancement module compared to the standard module
Learners achieve a knowledge acquisition level of 70 points or higher on average across all module assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
